mapper.sql: id, suit_name, test_type, skill_type, suit_util, createtime, updatetime
mapper.insert: insert into suite (id, suit_name, test_type, skill_type, suit_util, createtime, updatetime, suit_guide) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skillType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suitUtil,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{suitGuide,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into suite
id,
suit_name,
test_type,
skill_type,
suit_util,
createtime,
updatetime,
suit_guide,

mapper.update: update suite set suit_name = #{suitName}, test_type = #{testType}, skill_type = #{skillType} where id = #{suitId}

update suite set suit_name = #{suitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_type = #{skillType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suit_util = #{suitUtil,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, suit_guide = #{suitGuide,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update suite set suit_name = #{suitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, test_type = #{testType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_type = #{skillType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, suit_util = #{suitUtil,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updatetime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into suite ( suit_name, test_type, skill_type, suit_util, createtime, suit_guide) values( #{suitName}, #{testType}, #{skillType}, #{suitUtil}, #{createtime}, #{suitGuide} )
